module.title: Servers
module.author: Christian Würker
module.sql:
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `<%?prefix%>servers`; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `<%?prefix%>servers` ( `serverId` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `status` tinyint(1) NOT NULL, `title` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `description` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `createdAt` decimal(12,0) NOT NULL, `modifiedAt` decimal(12,0) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`serverId`), KEY `access` (`status`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `<%?prefix%>project_servers`; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `<%?prefix%>project_servers` ( `projectServerId` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `projectId` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL, `serverId` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL, `status` tinyint(1) NOT NULL, `version` varchar(10) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `title` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `description` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `createdAt` decimal(12,0) NOT NULL, `modifiedAt` decimal(12,0) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`projectServerId`), KEY `projectId` (`projectId`), KEY `serverId` (`serverId`), KEY `status` (`status`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `<%?prefix%>servers`; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `<%?prefix%>project_servers`;
